AutomatedActionReminder.name: AutomatedActionReminder
AutomatedActionReminder.description: Represents a reminder to the end user to take an action in the future.

ActionTakenDateTime.description: Timestamp of when the user took the action suggested by the reminder.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the automated action reminder record is locked or not.

IsValidForUser.description: Indicates whether the automated action is active and accessible to the user who owns the record (true) or not (false).

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the automated action reminder record can be edited or not.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record that triggered the reminder. For example, when a rule is set to Case, the value of this field is CaseId.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time this reminder is scheduled to be displayed to the user.

Type.description: The type of automated action reminder.
